ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Public Health Institute University Clinic for Clinical Biochemistry — Skopje

TYPE_AND_ACTIVITIES.TYPE_OF_CONTRACTING_AUTHORITY_OTHER: Health Institute University Clinic for C;inikal Biochemistry

TITLE_CONTRACT.P: Reagents, Calibrators, Controls and Disposable Material for Immune Analyzer Architect I 1000 "or equivalent" and Specific Reagents for Urine Determination

SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.P: PART 1: Determination of the concentration of Cyclosporine in transplanted patients for Architect i1000 "or equivalent".
PART 2: Tumor marker Total BHCG for Architect i1000 "or equivalent".
PART 3: Tumor marker CA 125, for Architect i1000 "or equivalent".
PART 4: Determination of the concentration of Homocysteine for Architect i1000 "or equivalent".
PART 5: Virus marker HBe antigen for Architect i1000 "or equivalent".
PART 6: Virus marker HBsAg antigen for Architect i1000 "or equivalent".
PART 7: Virus marker AntiHBs for Architect i1000 "or equivalent".
PART 8: Virus marker Anti-HBe for Architect i1000 "or equivalent".
PART 9: Virus marker Anti HBc for Architect i1000 "or equivalent".
PART 10: Virus marker Anti HCV for Architect i1000 "or equivalent".
PART 11: Virus marker HAVAB-G for Architect i1000 "or equivalent".
PART 12: Virus marker 'HAVAB-M for Architect i1000 or "equivalent".
PART 13: Heart marker highly sensitive TROPONIN I, for Architect i1000 "or equivalent".
PART 14: Virus marker HIV COMBO for Architect i1000 "or equivalent".
PART 15: Determination of the concentration of TACROLIMUS in transplanted patients for Architect i1000 "or equivalent".
PART 16: Tumor Marker SCC for Architect i1000 "or equivalent".
PART 17: Virus marker ANTI HBC M for Architect i1000 "or equivalent".
PART 18: Concentrated washing powder for Architect i1000 "or equivalent" maximum 4L.
PART 19: A device for conditioning the needle for taking samples for Architect i1000 "or equivalent".
PART 20: Solution for activation (polyethylene glycol octyphenyl ether and sodium hydroxide) for Architect i1000 "or equivalent" maximum 4L.
PART 21: Solution for pre-activation (1,32 % hydrogen peroxide) for Architect i1000 "or equivalent" maximum 4L.
PART 22: Plastic cups for sample with minimum height 48.87mm, minimum diameter 7.55 mm and conical bottom with minimum diameter 5.39 for Architect i1000 "or equivalent".

PART 23: Reaction cells plastic with opening long minimum 14.4 mm wide minimum 7.04 mm and high minimum 4.0mm, with height and width of the reaction cell of minimum 39.8 mm and 10.5 mm with conical bottom for Architect i1000 "or equivalent".
PART 24: Rubber caps for reagent for Architect i1000 "or equivalent".
PART 25: Replacement plastic caps for reagent with inner and outer diameter minimum 30mm and 35.28mm for Architect i1000 "or equivalent".
PART 26: Tumor marker HE4 for Architect i1000 "or equivalent".

PART 27: Test kit for determination of vanil mandelic acid in urine, chromatographic -spectrophotometric method for the appliance Hitachi U 1100. "or equivalent", with a minimum of 20 tests in packaging.
PART 28: Test kit for determination of methanephrine in urine, chromatographic-spectrophotometric method for the appliance Hitachi U 1100. "or equivalent" with a minimum of 40 tests in packaging.
PART 29: Test kit for determination of 17 ketosteroids in urine, chromatographic-spectrophotometric method for the appliance Hitachi U 1100 device. "or equivalent".
PART 30: Test kit for determination of 17 hydroxycorticosteroids in urine, chromatographic-spectrophotometric method for the appliance Hitachi U 1100. "or the equivalent".
PART 31: Test kit for determination of 5-hydroxybutyric acid in urine, chromatographic- spectrophotometric method for the appliance Hitachi U 1100. "or equivalent".
PART 32: Test kit for determination of Procalcitonin (PCT) in serum or plasma for Architect i1000 "or equivalent".

DEPOSITS_GUARANTEES_REQUIRED.P: Section IV: Legal, Economical, Financial and Technical Information

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: — Document for registered activity — DRD form or confirmation for registered activity,
— Resolution for medical devices wholesale, according to the Law on Medicines and Medical devices.

T_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: Technical and professional capacity of the economic operator:
Required documents for proving the technical and professional capacity of the economic operator:
— The economic operator for the offered goods needs to provide an authorization for putting a medical device into circulation in accordance with the Law on medicines and medical devices.
Minimum criteria for determining the technical and professional capacity of the economic operator:
— Resolution for putting a medical device into circulation in accordance with the Law on medicines and medical devices.

T_CAPACITY_MIN_LEVEL.P: Economic and financial capacity of the economic operator:
Required documents for evaluating the economic capacity of the economic operator:
Minimum criteria for determining the economic and financial capacity of the economic operator:

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: Additional information about electric action: All qualified contractors will be informed and invited for a auction.

EXISTENCE_AUTHORISED_PERSONS.P: Persons who want to be present at the opening of tenders must have authorisation letter from his/her economic operator.
